name: Monster Adventurer (itch)
description:
This is a turn-based game.

The protagonist is an old man.
Chase your dream and become an adventurer.
Without any frustration, he became an adventurer.
The life of an adventurer begins.

Teammate system
The protagonist can recruit two teammates, about 35 teammates are available for recruitment.
The teammate must be activated before the teammate will appear in the recruitable list.

Skill system
In addition to MP consumption, skills also have TP consumption
MP can be restored by potion and rest
TP can only be recovered through battle
The more advanced the skill, the more TP required

Backpack system
The team has a shared backpack that cannot be used in combat.
Everyone has an independent backpack that can be used in battle.

Add point system
Role upgrades can earn points, which can be used to increase ability values.

Skill learning system
Character upgrades can earn points, which can be used to learn their own skills.
Everyone has their own list of learning skills

Card system
Each monster has two kinds of cards.
One is to summon cards, you can summon this monster to fight.
The other is to transform the card, the character becomes this monster to fight.

Mission system
Only after the association accepts the task, can you go to the field to perform the task
A deposit is required to accept a task, and a task cannot be accepted without a deposit.

After receiving the mission, go out of the city gate, or open the menu and choose to go out to go to the mission location

Complete missions to earn prestige
Failed missions will lose prestige
prestige can improve the level of adventurers.
Of course, too low will reduce the level of adventurers.

Part-time work system
You can go to the store to work part-time.
This is a slow and automatic way to make money.
